projectlore.title: Project Lore
projectlore.desc: Created user interface and frontend for healthcare web app providing accurate medical advice via research articles annotated by verified users

barracudatech.title: Barracuda Technologies
barracudatech.desc: In this project, my role as a product designer was revamping the visual style and structure of the website for Barracuda Technologies, a company that creates sustainable materials out of agricultural waste.

problem.headline: Redesign the website structure and visual style for a more intuitive flow of information

sections.desc: The original information flow appears out of order from a UX perspective. The webpage starts with the product itself and how users can use it without introducing what problem the company is solving (appearing at the end instead).

personalwebsite.title: Personal Website
personalwebsite.desc: I created this personal website from scratch, testing designs on Figma, implementing it using ReactJS, and deploying it using NextJS.
